group_1.textRight: It feels like...I'm looking at my past self...

group_1.textLeft: What kind of person were you?

group_1.textCenter: I'm...very sensitive to...I guess@you could call it malice...
Ever since I was little,@I've had a hard time living with it...yes...
I just ended up becoming a Magical Girl by chance,@but...
because of that, now I fight against the Witches@that set off chains of negative emotions,
and I try my best to make the world a kinder place.
Even so, malice and irrationality@won't disappear from the world.
I once gave up, thinking it was impossible...
Rika, Emiri, and everyone else saved me,
and I found the hope to keep living in this world...
But...looking at the picture of@the Witch I could become,
I realized that, even now that I've found hope@in the world, I still feel the malice...
When I feel like there's nothing I can do,@and everything seems hopeless...
I might even think that it would be better@if this whole world disappeared...

group_1.textRight: I...I will never, give in to despair...!
Because, if I gave up on this world,@and threw it away...
I would...lose all of the people that I care about...
They're all so kind, and free of malice,
and I want to be with them forever...@and feel the same things...
That's why, even if it's hard, no matter what@happens...I'll keep moving forward...
I may be a weak person...
But I can't afford to fall into despair...!

group_1.textLeft: I, Alina, have grasped the hope@that's burning within you.
